text: Akho, ki jihara bada bure raha te huda hai tam rahimana usa nu dhila dida hai. Ithom taka ki jadom uha usa ciza nu dekha lainage, jisa da inham nala va'ada kita ja riha hai. Sasarika afata jam ki'amata da dina tam inham nu pata laga javega ki kisa di halata baî€¼uri hai ate kisa da dhara kamazora hai
